author: nurfikri89
body: This PR updates the JMENano workflow to make the following changes: - Setup the DQM for JMENano. The DQM step name is `nanojmeDQM`. - Increase the precision for the PileUp ID and Quark-Gluon Likelihood input variables. - Add AK4 jet ParticleNet gluon raw score. - Bugfix related to JetID configurations in JMENano. **PR validation:** - passes the JMENano workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -i all --ibeos -l 10224.15,11024.15,25202.15,11634.15` With this PR, the event size is 6.58 kb/event. The test was done with 10K events from a TTTo2J1L1Nu Run3Winter22MiniAOD file. Here is the cputime: The full content and size details can be found in the JMENano twiki: [size](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/pub/CMS/JMECustomNanoAOD/JMENano_forPR_40232_size.html) / [content](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/pub/CMS/JMECustomNanoAOD/JMENano_forPR_40232_content.html) **if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:** Once merged, this PR needs to be backported to 12_6_X.
title: [JMENanoAOD] Setup DQM and increase precision of PileUp ID & QGL input variables
